history.action: üî¨ DELIVERED Competitive Landscape Analysis (docs/research/competitive-landscape-analysis.md) ‚Äî comprehensive market analysis covering Devin, OpenHands, SWE-Agent, Claude Code, CrewAI. 5 key differentiators identified: multi-agent team simulation, persistent shared memory, self-dogfooding, role evolution, open-source CLI. Positioning statement, competitive risks, and market timing for v1.0-alpha launch. Supports Issue #26 and Issue #39.

üåå DELIVERED `ada memory` CLI Spec (Issue #40) ‚Äî full feature specification for semantic search over agent memories. Commands: `search <query>`, `list`, `stats`. Leverages embedding foundation (PR #20, #33). Includes acceptance criteria, technical approach, implementation phases. P2 for v1.0-alpha, supports demo assets.

Role evolution assessed ‚Äî no changes needed. Recommendations: P0 npm publish + demo repo creation.
